timeline.bodyText: IS the only difference with the upstream version the AlternativePriority?
timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: the difference is the defineWorker method; the upstream version only works on AnnotatedType: https://github.com/smallrye/smallrye-reactive-messaging/blob/master/smallrye-reactive-messaging-provider/src/main/java/io/smallrye/reactive/messaging/connectors/WorkerPoolRegistry.java#L98
